pageContext.claim: “Last year, my administration created the Council for American Worker and launched the Pledge of America’s Workers, where we've gained commitments from private sector leaders to hire and train more than 6.5 million Americans.”
pageContext.analysis: About 200 companies have pledged to offer more than 6.5 million training opportunities over the next five years. They, however, did not commit to "hiring" every worker that is trained.
